title: GEA TimeTrack Insights
description: Employee time performance analyzer for GE Appliances using CSV timesheet data

pages.name: Dashboard
pages.purpose: Display top/bottom performers and time analysis

pages.name: Raw Data
pages.purpose: View and filter original timesheet records

acceptance_criteria: Must accurately parse and validate CSV format
Show top/bottom 3 performers with clear explanations
Display daily timeline with +/-5 minute schedule deviations
Allow filtering by date and employee
Handle invalid time records with alerts
